sections.title: Introducing Airbnb Adventures
sections.subtitle: Multi-day trips led by local experts—activities, meals, and stays included

trip_templates.title: Forest Farm - Tour, Meals, Glamping
trip_templates.description_text: Day 1 - 3:00 PM: Upon arrival you will be greeted and settled into your accommodations. We then embark on a 2 hour farm tour including an intro to Permaculture Design and Eco-Forestry. 4:00 PM: The tour begins in the shiitake mushroom yard, onto the chicken and duck condo, greenhouse, nursery, vegetable and herb gardens, honeybees, orchards and into the edge of a classic Appalachian hardwood forest. 6:00 PM: We gather inside the 1800's hand hewn chestnut cabin to enjoy a vegetarian "forest to table" meal lovingly prepared with ingredients grown and foraged in our gardens and woodlands. (All meals are vegetarian. Vegan and/or GF available w advance notice). Guests will then have an opportunity to browse our farm store to purchase produce, eggs, plants, books, seeds and herbal products before heading off to your campsite for an evening around the fire and sweet dreams, (we supply all the equipment, you bring the smores). Day 2,  9:00 AM-1:00 PM: Wake up to a hardy farm breakfast and hot drinks. Enjoy self guided tours, hikes, yoga and free range nature bathing.  Want to stay longer? Message us about booking multiple-nights to experience life in a botanical sanctuary w/ meals, snacks and glamping provided.  The schedule is a repeat of the previous day except your on the crew, learning hands on about wild foods, Appalachian ecology, permaculture and organic gardening! Kids welcome!
